Title: The Return
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story)
Actors: Kimberly Brooks, Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: The Return: A new threat arrives in Beach City. / Jail Break: Steven teams up with a new ally to rescue the Gems.
